description: Details required for Condition 13 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission 24/02730/FUL (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved plans) for Application Reference Number: 24/01946/FUL (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved plans) for Application Reference Number: 21/01831/FUL (Partial demolition of 27 Victoria Road and redevelopment to provide a part single storey, part three storey rear extension, including mansard roof and roof terrace, to provide office (Class E) at ground floor including residential entrance and residential use(Class C3) comprising 8 no.x residential units at upper levels and aterations to existing facade of the building together with associated works.) dated 31/03/2022 as amended under 22/02576/NMA. Variation to consist of Amendments to the extent of the bike store, residential reception and fire escape from the retail unit; Relocation of residential entrance gate; Omission of window on the western facade; Introduction of new planter at ground level; Retention of existing brick panel on St Andrews Road; Internal alterations to the layout of the individual units; Introduction of additional bathroom in unit 3.4; Introduction of ventilation shaft to serve the office floorspace within the private courtyards of units 3.3, 3.4 and at roof level; Amendments to the roof terrace.). Variation to consist of alterations to office entrances and retention of brick panel along St Andrew's Road.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
